name: ArduinoWaterTank
0:
”Alexa tell water tank to pour eight ounces of water”
”Alexa tell water tank to stop”
”Alexa tell water tank to pour sixteen ounces of water”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: water tank
des:
Used to interact with an Arduino Board that is connected to a servo and a ESP8266 WiFi module that is interacting with Amazon IoT services. The program uses this skill to acquire a number than is then processed through Arduino code and outputted onto a servo motor to control flow rate of the water dispenser.
Requirements: 
Arduino Uno R3
ESP8266 WiFi Module
Alexa Input Device
Servo
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
